New Records: Rahmanullah Gurbaz scored 118.91 points, the highest CRICINFO's MVP in the match
Fazalhaq Farooqi took 5/9, the best bowling figures in the match
Key Match Events: Fazalhaq Farooqi took 5 wickets for 9 runs
Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for 12 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Fazalhaq Farooqi was awarded the Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Providence Stadium in Guyana
